channel.title: Virus Scans
channel.description:
I see all over the server downloads section a virus scan , which makes members feel safe that there are no viruses , Trojans , malware.. etc. But that virus scan can be fake. i mean they show only that "Scan complete , No viruses found" , what if they scanned another folder and uploaded the real folder which is full of viruses?
:L

item.title: Virus Scans
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

It’s the internet, if you think cause something has an image saying it’s real ever means it actually is might as well just turn off your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Virus Scans
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Almost every virus scan i see, there’s multiple scans for each the source and client folder.
You see one scan for the client folder that says:
“Successfully scanned 12 items”
And the other:
“Successfully scanned 109 items”
It’s obvious they’re not the same folder XD

Read full topic

:L
[/quote]Alright and whats your point?

ot:
never seen a moparian with 10 rep lol?[/quote]Its because of some minor things, like not being very smart and stuff. No one reps me because I am a loser

ALSO if you get a virus anyways from a RSPS thing that’s kind of silly

item.title: Virus Scans
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

so run a virus scan yourself before you run anything?

if you download a virus it doesn’t do anything until you click on it and open it

Read full topic
